Cost accounting, classifying costs, cost sheet, marginal costing, break even graph budget, budgetary control

string-array.name: OperationResearch

Simulation-meaning,methods,Monte Carlo method and its application; Decision theory-definition, various models, fators of decision under risk, alternative action plan, narginal analysis, decision trees, posterior analysis,utility function; Investment decision ,Appraisal techniques
